description.value: IPS Allergy intolerance substance condition IPS value set. This value set includes the codes from the SNOMED International Global Patient Set (GPS) subset of SNOMED CT that are included in: all descendants of 373873005 |Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product); all descendants of 105590001 |Substance (substance); all descendants of 418038007 |Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding).
